sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild, ElementRef } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tutorial', templateUrl: './tutorial.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tutorial.component.scss'] }) export class TutorialComponent implements OnInit { isLogged: boolean = false; @ViewChild('carousel') carousel: ElementRef | undefined; cardCount!: number; currentIndex!: number; cardWidth: number; ngOnInit() { this.checkLog(); this.cardCount = 6; // Numero totale di card this.currentIndex = 4; // Indice corrente del carosello } checkLog() { let user = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (user) { this.isLogged = true; } } scrollCarousel(direction: string) { if (!this.carousel) { return; } const carouselElement = this.carousel.nativeElement; const scrollAmount = this.cardWidth * 4; // Scorrimento di 4 card alla volta if (direction === 'prev') { this.currentIndex = Math.max(this.currentIndex - 4, 0); } else if (direction === 'next') { this.currentIndex = Math.min(this.currentIndex + 4, this.cardCount - 4); } carouselElement.scrollTo({ left: this.currentIndex * this.cardWidth, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }
